attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let's introduce tougher sentencing for peodophiles, such as castration being the best penalty as most end up re- offending, lets help keep our children safe from these sick people. Also longer sentences and bring out name and shame offenders that have been convicted in all local papers and international papers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
